  • Method Details

    • getAllClients

      List<Client> getAllClients()
      Retrieves all clients.
      Returns:
      List of all clients.

    • getClientById

      Client getClientById(Long id)
      Retrieves a client by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The client with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • createClient

      Client createClient(Client client)
      Creates a new client.
      Parameters:
      client - The client object to be created.
      Returns:
      The created client.

    • updateClient

      Client updateClient(Long id, Client clientDetails)
      Updates an existing client.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to update.
      clientDetails - The updated client details.
      Returns:
      The updated client.

    • deleteClient

      void deleteClient(Long id)
      Deletes a client.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to delete.
